original_text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.
korean_text: 마음을 살피시는 이가 성령의 생각을 아시나니 이는 성령이 하나님의 뜻대로 성도를 위하여 간구하심이니라

sentences.original_text: And he that searcheth the hearts
knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit
because he maketh intercession for the saints
according to the will of God.
